WalkthroughÂ¶

It is time to build the code. These narrated walkthroughs cover the development process for poplar_oeaddlne.OE0500_oe_add_line and poplar_oeaddlne.OE1100_oe_add_line Python scripts, putting the final script into an Extender module, and upgrading the module and script to lookup the item information from a custom table.
